entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET November 2022 Updates #240
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-41064 | .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #239

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink has a commented PackageId in runtime #78073
    8.0.0
  • How to identify HttpClient connect timeout errors? #78070
  • net7.0 `System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter#WriteBase64String` requires `RefStructs` compiler feature VB.NET #78065
  • Custom pooling AsyncMethodBuilder #78064
  • [API Proposal]: Add custom polynomial support for Crc32 and Crc64 class #78063
  • Rename linker to illink #78059
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.runtime.linux-x64 package from CI is missing library packages #78054
  • GCHeap::GetLastGCPercentTimeInGC incorrectly(?) returning 0 value #78053
  • Move ILLink documentation to runtime docs folder #78052
    8.0.0
  • Tools illink should use runtime formatting #78050
    8.0.0
  • Frozen collection tests fail on NativeAOT #78046
  • s390x: XxHash3Tests.Hash_OneShot_Expected and Hash_Streaming_Expected tests fail #78043
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-41064 | .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #78042
  • MissingMethodException raised from System.Management.WmiNetUtilsHelper during wmi call (.NET6 self-contained) #78038
  • Assembly resolution algorithm difference between .NET 6 and .NET 4.8 #78037
  • Some incorrect NRT annotations in System.CodeDom #78036
  • [API Proposal]: Can exception not collect StackTrace? #78031
  • JsonConverter constructor causes MissingMetadataException upon instantiation #78029
  • [jitstress] Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General.Program:AbsDouble()' during 'Generate code' #78023
    8.0.0
  • VC++ debug errors in mscordaccore on main #78019
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ObjectDisposedException in System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes #78017
  • IOException in FileStreamHelpers.CheckFileCall on Linux when reading from file #78016
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf #78039
  • Regression from Propagate only BBF_COPY_PROPAGATE PR #78040
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #78041
  • Objects logging using @ operator in source generator attribute #78013
    Future
  • Property injection based on init accessors #78009
    Future
  • [mono] Array.IndexOf / Span<T>.IndexOf very slow on .net 7 #78008
  • NRE in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventPipePayloadDecoder if Threading event keywords are enabled. #78006
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0582\\csgen.1\\csgen.1.cmd #78002
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #78001
    8.0.0
  • Bounds check not eliminated with enumerator #78000
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ConfigurationBinder sets values for not configured properties #36508
    Future
  • Unable to debug Browser - WASM from Visual Studio in NET7 release #78071
  • ConfigurationBinder.GetValue<T> can raise InvalidOperationException with non-nullable value types #42868
    Future
  • Implement T.MinValue and T.MaxValue for INumber<T> area-System.Numerics #78061
  • Handling preinstall pre-requivisites #77953
  • .NET 6 trimmed mode fails if the app uses obsolete code #78014
  • Revisit AES-GCM on macOS #29811
    Future
  • Keep track of select flaky functional tests for Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #33992
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 9/22/2022 3:16:12 AM #77900
  • CI broken on s390x - toolchain issue #78026
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add support for ValueTypes in DebuggerProxyAttribute #68390
    8.0.0
  • Mono does not null-check addresses for zero-offset `ldflda`s #77647
    8.0.0
  • impAppendStmt sets spillGlobEffects conservatively and inconstently for block ops #6042
    Future
  • Reg optional analysis in lowering is missing safety checks #72673
    8.0.0
  • Make Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.CopyTo public #77743
  • [libraries-pgo arm32/x86] Failure in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.AggregateExceptionTests.Flatten #77710
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8JsonReader.TryCopyString #77714
  • STJ Source Generator fails to do polymorphic serialization for built-in types #58134
    Future
  • System.Text.Json code gen: collision when two classes share same name but different namespaces #58198
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator name conflicts #58938
    Future
  • Dotnet tools not found when using xargs #3444
    Future
  • [release/3.1] CI failure: CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestUsageTests.AlwaysVersion3 - unable to build chain to self-signed root for signer (null) #76653
  • Configuration binding swallows the conversion exception #73915
    8.0.0
  • Why LdapException.ServerErrorMessage is empty on Linux? #70210
    Future
  • NullabilityInfoContext reports `Unknown` instead of `NotNull` for `ClassRestrictedGeneric<>` #75126
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add HashTo/GetCurrentHashAs{UInt32/64} methods #78075
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: fix gc hole in peephole optimizations #78074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `DllCharacteristics.ForceIntegrity` and `ControlFlowGuard`. #78072
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Return NULL for mmap fail case on Unix #78069
  • [wasm] Enable System.Numerics vectors SIMD #78068
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement Vector128.Abs intrinsics #78067
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [main] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. (#76206) #78060
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Exclude unnecessary functions/fields when FEATURE_METADATA_EMIT_IN_DEBUGGER #78058
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #78057
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix build error due to unused windowSize parameter in pal_console.c #78056
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #78051
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Linker into runtime diff2 #78049
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Disable failing XxHash3Tests on s390x #78045
    area-System.IO
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #78035
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK (WIP) #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Update `GTF_VAR_USEASG` in the GS transformation #78028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Normalize SIMD comparisons #78027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `ComputeManagedAssembliesToCompileToNative`: Make `microsoft.netcore.app` check case-insensitive. #78022
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with Vector<T>.Multiply #78021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78018
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.x
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update framework to net8.0 for perf-job. #78012
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve IndexOfAnyInRange throughput #78007
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • noop change to see if tests pass #78005
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix a few recent perf regressions in Regex #78003
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Reflection context tests working #77999
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add additional case where public signing cannot be used #77998
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add linker to area owners #77983
    area-Meta
  • Add Readme.md for Resources, Threading.Tasks, Threading.Channels, ComilerServices, Configuration and CodeDom assemblies #77932
    area-Meta
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security, breaking-change
  • Links to issue with more info on flaky behavior #77859
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [mono] Don't use lld on s390x architecture #78032
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix the build with BACKGROUND_GC turned off #77328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Added null-checks for LDFLDA on pointers. #77827
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix build break due to IDE0060 #78025
    8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Small cleanups #77954
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix typo in timeout. #78011
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • unify error handling for FileStream and Pipe Streams #77543
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Remove .NET 6 Console Key Parser #77977
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for clz and ctz instructions #77777
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Fix GenTreeCall::Equals for virtual vs static calls #77981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimize (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Update repository URL in package.json #77937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix sprintf deprecation error with Xcode 14.1 #77950
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add AVX-512 testing pipeline #77930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes typo in TimerQueue.Portable.cs comment #77997
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Improve coreclr test infra #77929
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize String.Equals for OrdinalIgnoreCase #77947
    area-System.Globalization
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable software writewatch and card bundles on Windows. #77934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Sync linker to NativeAOT #77894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Reduce host memory usage: don't keep resolved deps around for app lifetime #77987
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Fix Configuration with IList and ICollection #77857
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77847
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Number block assignments normally #77690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Clean up JIT<->EE "get class name" methods, support nested classes in method sets #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [corlib] Move System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper to the shared partition #77939
    area-System.Reflection
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • DNER multi-reg locals early if they cannot be enregistered #77943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix stack corruption bug on green threads #2070

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007
  • Filament/prolog debug #2069

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.0 Release not taking into account global.json and downgrade to 6 #28959
  • Coverage output paths are being ignored after update to .NET 7 #28952
  • Cannot load or run lots of my projects in my solution after installing .NET 7 #28947
  • dotnet watch on net6.0 project results in FileNotFoundException for SystemRuntime #28942

Closed

  • Warn when publishing in Debug configuration #28927
  • [Package Validation] Link to diagnostics ID docs page in suppression files #19515
    7.0.2xx
  • [ApiCompat] Support passing in multiple suppression files #26746
    7.0.2xx
  • dotnet workload list --machine-readable with 6.0.400 preview do not list installed workloads from previous sdk band #25772
    7.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2040349 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #28950
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the RTM version of 7.0 #28949
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28948
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #28946
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #28945
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #28944
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #28943
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce official builds for servicing branches #28940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the desktop test projects #28932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Include ijwhost in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroupOutput #28929
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Support calling unique launch profiles with a case-insensitive nature & Improve errors around launch profiles #28908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Make mapping infrastructure unit testable, Ignore effectively sealed members and types and add tests #28941
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add diagnostic id docs link to suppression file #28918
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28907
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28928
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2040012 #28914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support multiple suppression files #28934
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Introduce a class library Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtensions #28855
    Area-GenAPI
  • Update ApiCompat entries in CODEOWNERS file #28919
  • Upgrade the verbosity of error headers #28917
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28904
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28909
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28892
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • Add zsh compdef completion script. #14239
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • adding a base record for exception #6670

Updated

  • Champion: Remove error "Cannot yield a value in the body of a try block with a catch clause" #2949
    Any Time

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add notes from params improvements working group meeting 2022-11-03 #6657

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename type in a shared project does nothing when "Rename Symbol's file" #65286
  • [LSP] Support commit character item defaults #65282
    17.5
  • Roslyn workspace should share SyntaxTrees across project targets when possible. #65278
    17.5
  • IDE0060 shouldn't warn for throw-only methods #65275
  • Ability to fully customize debugger views for custom types beyond [DebuggerDisplay], [DebuggerTypeProxy] #65269

Closed

  • Test plan for ref fields #59194
    17.4
  • Semantic snippets: `if` snippet can sometimes "eat" leading lines #64924
  • Semantic snippets: `cw` snippet inserts unexpected blank line when between statements #65150
  • `IDE0019 Use pattern matching` Should be smarted about unused variables #65287
  • Incorrect nullability warnings for conditional access in assertion method #34875
    Compiler.Next
  • Can we have C# code directly without class? #14143
  • CS1997 is anachronistically specific. #59001
    Backlog
  • Document C# extension: [return: attribute] on accessor that returns void #62145
    C# 12.0
  • C#, Edit.FormatSelection not formatting code macro-disabled (#if) blocks #41592
    Backlog
  • Add FxCop/Roslyn Analyzers file and class exclusion rules to Tools/Options #41167
    Backlog
  • Yielding in catch blocks not supported in async iterators #39583
    Compiler.Next
  • Proposal: Automatic fields and properties setting from the constructor #14853
  • Ability to promote dead code analysis suggestion to warning or error #34357
    Backlog
  • SemanticModel.GetDeclaredSymbol(DiscardDesignationSyntax) returns null #34031
    Compiler.Next
  • csc optimizer suboptimal #27222
    Backlog
  • Need trim start whitespace per line in string of $@ format #32965
    Backlog
  • Lambda Bodied Properties: [method: .... attribute target #29566
  • C# Preprocessor bug?; found in VS2017 (15.7.2) #27109
  • using static prefers the method group over enum members in an ambigious call #20605
    Backlog
  • Short-hand "object-literal" syntax for anonymous objects #20102
  • [Suggestion]Create a new assignment operator to have many assignments in one statement #19641
  • using statement needs embedded catch #18378
  • dynamic interface wrapping #18232
  • Feature request: SQL IN statement style comparison for C# #17877
  • Proposal: Make brackets optional on empty bodied constructor overloads. #17306
  • [idea] return using to enforce using on upper stack #16958
  • Conditional coalescing operator #16813
  • [language improvements] R language like optional parameter expression in VisualBasic #16767
  • base keyword not detect extension method #16763
  • Idea: encapsulating mutable property operator? #16665
  • Negating a function #16613
  • C# nameof() with substring specifier - nameof(AccountsController, 0, 8) #16503
  • [proposal] Support anonymous delegate type #16488
  • [Alias Macro] Improvements on the type alias name #16292
  • Proposal: default constructor #16192
    Backlog
  • Allow stackalloc for reference types when they are used as locals when not escaping #16154
  • C# - Static and Instance members with the same signature should be valid. #16104
  • Proposal: VisualBasic Syntax sugar for lazy property #16032
  • Change Scoping on Do...While condition #15986
  • Generic type expansion + overload resolution can pick a version that causes a type error where an explicit choice exists #15911
  • Pattern matching spec for "switch" uses undefined non-terminal "complex_pattern" #15904
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Name aliases for members of generic types #15847
  • Proposal: Allow block-statements with return values everywhere an expression is expected #15821
  • First-class generic method / First-class polymorphism / Rank-N types #15810
  • Proposal: Bidirectional mapping syntax: #15735
  • Issue: var does not handle Generic anonymous functions #15661
  • Issue: C# Assigning variable to inline delegate and using it in the delegate body causes "Using unassigned variable" error #15660
  • Proposal: Modify sequence expression to allow scope variables like "var x = { e is int y ? y : 0 }" #15651
  • Proposal: language support for lazy initialization and modification #15639
  • Proposal: "while" as a LINQ query expression clause #15638
  • Allow ref-returning get-only auto-properties #15623
  • Allow "unsafe fixed" statement or unsafe keyword skipping #15607
  • tuples and disposable objects #9882
    Backlog
  • Propose compiler support for currying/partial application of delegates/methods. #15575
  • Proposal: Take ref return into consideration during overload resolution #15561
    Backlog
  • Multiple Constructor dependencies #15484
  • Init char array with a prefixed string literal #15423
  • Logical extension to else-if: also-if #15416
  • Syntax sugar for lazy object #15251
  • Allow security transparency attributes on async methods #15244
  • Propose that functions have implicit function pointers #15237
  • Propose a function syntax to back-off function signature verification for mutual recursion #15233
  • InvalidCastException thrown for converting between types for which explicit/implicit conversions are declared #15174
  • sizeof() of an struct is not treated like a constant like sizeof(int). #15116
  • new 'reverse arrow' operator to making arrow expressions more powerful #15039
  • Propose multiple arguments share type #14971
  • Extend `throw` syntax to include a conditional check #14924
  • Proposal: finally (Exception ex) #14831
  • Proposal: Nested enums #14720
  • Out var scope vs extension methods #14694
  • type infer from left operand and json style object initialize #14666
  • Discussion: generalized templates #14619
  • Proposal: Optionally store names in ValueTuple, for further processing (databinding) #14395
  • Implicit interface conversion #14186
  • Proposal: C# language support of "weak" keyword #13950
  • C# dynamic behaviour in ternary operators #13878
  • Proposal: tuple-friendly return type syntax for methods #13744
  • Allow setting the default value of an optional parameter to one of the non-default parameters #13595
  • Implicit Try Feature Request #13367
  • Proposal: provide a way of naming lambda method parameters #12716

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Argument "3": Cannot convert from „Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.EventCallback<System.DateTime>” on „System.Action<System.DateTime>” #44955
  • Request features for request and response byte sizes #44953
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext #44948
  • Invoking AddMvcCore 2x results in a "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: exists" #44945
  • HTTP Trailers Causing Response Truncation in FireFox when Served from IIS on Windows Server 2022 #44944
  • Potential out of memory with slow SignalR clients #44943
  • Long delay for request to start while debugging and another request is waiting #44940
  • Visual Studio Application Insights (Visual Studio only) feature not working at all #44938
  • [Blazor] We should support updating and removing statically rendered root components #44937
    .NET 8 Planning
  • PersistentComponentState: persist state outside OnPersisting callback #44936
  • PersistentComponentState: large state will crash the client, unable to recover #44935
  • Blazor WASM, Unhandled exception rendering component: ExpectedStartOfValueNotFound on login after published #44934
  • X-Requested-With header is incorrect in FetchHttpClient #44933
  • Make StaticFileOptions.OnPrepareResponse async #44932
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #44931
  • Blazor Hybrid Apps: Integrate API Controllers to fetch data offline via https://0.0.0.0/api/method calls from Javascript Frameworks #44929
    Backlog
  • No cleanup of rootcomponent #44928

Closed

  • [Blazor] new bind suffixes (after,get,set) fail to compile with .Net 7 #44952
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #44930
  • TypeScript type definitions (d.ts) not available for the "Blazor" object #44942
  • regular problems of MapFallbackToFile method for help #44881

Created

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.1

    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Remove experimental and dotnet5 feeds #44877
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [main] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #44868
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #44946
    3.1.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `a4f02ef` #44916
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated
